data.name: Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor: The Place Found for Oneself
data.short_description: Preparations begin for Sistine and Leos' wedding ceremony. Rumia holds out faith that the vanished Glenn will return, but they still have no word from him by the day of the wedding.
